text: Loviisa () is a town in Uusimaa, Finland. As of January 2014, almost 15,500 people lived there. Nearby municipalities are Kouvola, Lapinj채rvi, Myrskyl채, Porvoo and Pyht채채. Loviisa was established in 1745. The people living there speak two languages: Finnish and Swedish. == Other websites == * * The official page Category:Towns in Finland Category:Municipalities of Uusimaa Category:1745 establishments Category:18th-century establishments in Finland Category:1740s establishments in Europe
